titleStmt.title: The second part of The amours of Messalina, late Queen of Albion wherein the secret court intrigues of the four last years reign are further pursued, particularly the imposture of the child / by a woman of quality ...
titleStmt.author: Woman of quality, fl. 1689-1690.
Leti, Gregorio, 1630-1701.

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to Gregorio Leti. Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
A libel on Mary of Modena, Queen consort of James II. Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
